website_summaries.verdict: Unbeatable in price, this hair dryer is compact and lightweight but not as small as some travel models tend to be.
pros: Not just for travel, this dryer is powerful and quiet and quickly dries hair
cons: low temp seems too weak and high temp gets extremely hot

customer_reviews.title: FIRE! It Caught Fire!
customer_reviews.text: -DEFECTIVE- It just caught fire moments ago, almost setting my T-shirt ablaze! The black plastic turned cherry red and was dripping off the drier and the room filled with smoke!
customer_reviews.author: A. Customer

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: Used this for pinewood derby outlaw car, won first place.
customer_reviews.author: DaByuBoy

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Afraid to use it, every time I turn it on it smells like it's burning. the first few times I tried it, it burned me because it is so incredibly hot, even on the low settings. Worried if I use it it will catch on fire. It's clean and still brand new, so it's not hair that is making the smell. My outlets are fine as well. I think just made poorly. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Milton

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer is defective. It blew out alternating hot and cold air while on the hot air setting. When I looked into the vent it looked like a spark kept appearing and I was afraid it would either blow a circuit or start a fire. This was a cheap dryer. Now I know why. I also bought the regular sized Revlon dryer and it worked normally.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels101

customer_reviews.title: Not the best product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 11 year old daughter due to size weight and reviews. Well we tried it out Christmas evening before heading out to visit family and the barrel and handle got super hot. Turned it off and switched to a different outlet thinking maybe that was the issue, and again it got super hot and started to smell. Thankfully I was the one drying her hair and not her she might not have known to unplug. I have a Revlon hairdryer that I love so I will keep searching for one for her.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie King

customer_reviews.title: Handheld inferno
customer_reviews.text: Cons: This hair dryer is the equivalent of holding your head over a volcano and letting the flames of hell waft up to give you a sleek blow out. The unit gets so hot that it melts it’s own plastic. It’s so hot that it hurts your hand to hold it by the handle. If that weren’t bad enough...it will blast out incremental embers of pure FIRE that leave little fried places on your hair. The hair obviously falls out in those spots. Pros: With great dexterity and a bottle of heat protectant...you can do a full blowout in less than 20 min. 10/10 might burn your house down. Will burn your hair off at the very least.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: A great product that exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much when I bought this hair dryer. It was less than 10 bucks so I couldn't expect it to be that great of a product. However, I needed a hair dryer at a cheap price. When I got Revlon's hair dryer, I was surprised at how effective it was. I'm very low maintenance with my hair, & just wanted this hair dryer to dry my hair after I shower. This hair dryer did just that. It's not a huge dryer either, so it can be very travel friendly. There's also no bad hair drying smells that come out of it either, which is even better. Overall, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dina C

customer_reviews.title: Great little dryer
customer_reviews.text: I had a really old hair dryer that was starting to spark so this is clearly a step up. It's a great size for storage purposes and it dries pretty quickly. It's pretty powerful for a small dryer. It gets pretty hot, but not to a concerning temperature.
customer_reviews.author: NotAWitchProbably

customer_reviews.title: Easy dryer? Right here.
customer_reviews.text: For a one off inexpensive dryer, this one is great. I've used it several times. It's not too loud, has a removable back so you can clean the lint out of it! Three settings (off, warm, hot and cool), which is perfect for me. If you want a simple and low maintenance dryer, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Rogalla

customer_reviews.title: Just don’t.
customer_reviews.text: I was just going to buy this hair dryer when I noticed a posting on top of the page telling me I can just tell Alexa to reorder it for me. Apparently this is the same blowe dryer sitting on my vanity that was shooting sparks out this morning . I had purchased it last June. Hasn’t even been a year! So no. I’m not going to reorder it. That’s all I needed to know.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It's small but does great work! Everyone steals this from me to use it XD. I works great and I had it for a while now. I am so happy I got this. It does seem a bit cheap but it still works great. I dont have any problems with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Brooks

customer_reviews.title: beefy
customer_reviews.text: I know the gun is for professional hairstyling.When throwing large porcelain, and airbrushing glaze you need to apply a little hot air here and there, as a professional trick of the trade.This beefy gun is easy to hold; the buttons are intuitive and the step- up feature is helpful.Well built solid construction throughout.Have used it regularly for a few years now, and I like it.
customer_reviews.author: John Feesey

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time on this hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews but I had to for this product. I was beyond disappointed by this product. As soon as I turned it to the high setting it smelled like it was on fire. Needless to say I quickly turned it off. The low setting barely gets hot. I mean for $20 what did I really expect? You get what you pay for. If you're looking into getting this product. Don't. Just spend the money on a better quality hairdryer
customer_reviews.author: Camizzle222

customer_reviews.title: I usually use only cool on my hair and there is no choice with ...
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer runs very very hot. I usually use only cool on my hair and there is no choice with this dryer. I will be returning this dryer
customer_reviews.author: Hink

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bangs!
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up because I have the full size version and it's great, but I wanted something compact to keep on my counter. I recently got bangs and blow drying them wet with a round brush is the only way they look right. This does the job beautifully, fast, and doesn't take more than a minute. I only dry my bangs. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn's time

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for one day....
customer_reviews.text: I was bummed, my sister has this same hair dryer and I love it, but mine only worked for 1 day. Worked fine yesterday, then today I went to use it and it had a very low fan, when I tried to use the "cool" button it stopped altogether. I tried waiting a few minutes, hit reset button, tried a different outlet. I'm really disappointed because in my sister's hair dryer of the same model, it all works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Hair Dryer
customer_reviews.text: This item stopped working after about four weeks.... right after the window to return, of course. Terrible and cheap hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: A Decent hair Dryer for the money.  May be too hot for use by children unsupervised.
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, but air flow to me is poor compared to other Hair Dryers in the same class. The blowing air is very hot, almost too hot, so I do not recommend children using this hair dryer, Also, the outside does also get very hot, again so, in my opinion, I do not believe that this hair dryer should be used by children under the age of 12. Other than that, it's a decent hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: taz0921

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, cheap, and it works, but the words words wore off the on/off button in about 6-7 uses...unsettling, and makes me wonder how the rest of it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Light efficient hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for three weeks and it is very efficient. I use it all the time to dry out my hair before styling it. I like its light weight and medium size. It has two heat settings (low and high hot air) in addition to cold air feature. It can be stored anywhere dry and cool. It does not produce an annoyingly loud sound that I use it while my husband and son are sleeping. Its price is indeed unbeatable given its features. I highly recommend it. I will update the review as I continue using it.
customer_reviews.author: Ahlam

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little hair dryer! It doesn't have any bells or whistles, but it has really strong power. My only complaint is that there isn't a protective foam material at the air intake end like my previous dryer had. So if you end up accidentally getting your hair sucked in, it goes way in and gets stuck. The first time I used the dryer I had to literally pull my hair out, breaking it off inside. For this reason, I highly advise against purchasing this hair dryer for a child. But for adults who can be more careful of the angles you're holding the dryer, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: K. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: It really blows..lol
customer_reviews.text: This is a very simple very basic medium size dryer. I don't have the longest hair by any means, but even if I did, this has the power and the push to make enough air flow just the way anyone would need. It's got cool, low, and high settings. It's also got soft feet on each side so when you set it down, it won't burn/melt anything. It doesn't get that hot, but still, it's nice to have in the product as part of the design. In the end, this was a GREAT purchase. Simple, functional, lightweight. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Little Thing
customer_reviews.text: I have INCREDIBLY thick hair, but I just moved out on my own for the first time, so I didn't have much extra cash to spare, so I bought this thinking it would be good in a pinch. It's AMAZING! It dries my hair just as quickly and effectively as my friends $100+ dryer. It's a powerful little thing and I love it. The only thing I deducted a star off of was "travel". It's a great size for travel, but for a travel purpose, it'd be nice if it folded. That being said, I bought it as my every day dryer and couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Green

customer_reviews.title: Good, but could be hotter on low setting.
customer_reviews.text: The high setting on this travel hair dryer is great, but the low setting isn't as hot as I'd like it. I need the slow speed to be reasonably hot for my hair. This low setting isn't hot enough to hurt my wrist when held 2 inches away. It's also larger than some mini dryers. Even so, it's a good, small dryer, and I plan to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B

customer_reviews.title: Cheap hair dryer....that dries hair
customer_reviews.text: I actually did not purchase this to dry my hair, but it can obviously do that without an issue. It's nothing fancy, works at high or lower intensity and has a cool air button. It is a standard sized hair dryer, so not really travel friendly for space, but for the money I guess you wouldn't care as much if you lost it. For the price it accomplishes what I needed it for and hasn't disappointed yet.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Good mid-size hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: When I went to replace my trusty Sassoon hair dryer recently, I found they're no longer available. But lo and behold, I found the exact same dryer (except for color) being sold under the Revlon name. I can only assume Revlon bought the rights to produce the dryer. See photo above. I was shopping for the same dryer because I've gotten such good service from the old one. These things go for years with no trouble at all. They're light and they're small enough to pack in your suitcase for travel without taking up too much room, and they just work.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Packs a Punch for a travel dryer
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old hair dryer finally died. I was so sad, because that thing was powerful! I wanted something with a lot of drying power, but that also wasn't going to take up my entire limited bathroom counter. So, I decided to go with this Revlon travel dryer. It works great! It's small and compact, but really has a lot of power behind it, so I don't feel like I'm taking four hours to dry my hair. It works fast, has a great heat/cold setting difference, and is small enough I don't have to worry about counter space or storage.
customer_reviews.author: laurajo06

customer_reviews.title: Defrost my refrigerator/freezer perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: OK, I definitely did not buy this for blow drying my hair – I’m a baldheaded dude! I did it back to defrost the bottom of my refrigerator freezer. Got it today. And guess what? I defrost the bottom of my refrigerator today. This baby works, for defrosted freezers! Oh yeah. You can’t beat the price. After that, the reason I’m back right in this view because I came back to buy a second one just because it works so well and the price is unbelievably low. Yes, I’m getting two for less than the price of one on some models. Anyway, that’s my feedback to you. #HappyShopping!
customer_reviews.author: HustonX

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful basic hairdryer for excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: My old hairdryer of 10+ years was losing power suddenly, giving me a heads-up that it could blow up in my hands as happened with a hairdryer in the past. (True story.) Despite yelling “Give it all you’ve got, Scotty!” (Captain Kirk reference), the old gal was shot. Found the perfect affordable replacement right here and could not be happier!
customer_reviews.author: R. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Cool button too
customer_reviews.text: High low and a cool button too. Let’s you toggle the heat to get just the right temperature. Low heat setting uses about 300 watts. Cool 150 watts. Runs off my small solar system on low but not on high @1800watts of corse. Great hair dryer and you can NOT beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rebark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value! Ordered a second!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this the other day, and am very impressed with it for $8.24! It’s nice and light, and the 1875 watts produces plenty of power. Only has 2 speeds and a cool shot (would’ve preferred a cool speed), but it’s slightly quieter than any of my others. Combined with the light weight and low price, I’m very pleased that I took a chance on the least costly one.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalGal

customer_reviews.title: Pooped Out
customer_reviews.text: I bought this is April of 2018 and forgot to buy a 'Protection Plan'. Now it is November 2018 and I have used it no more than 3 times and it is dead. Thank goodness it was inexpensive because it was a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Voigt

customer_reviews.title: Good power for your money
customer_reviews.text: I actually like it more than I was expecting. It's lightweight and looks very simple (few buttons, no retractable cord, etc) and that might make it feel cheap, but there's absolutely nothing wrong with its drying power.
customer_reviews.author: Lemon_Tea

customer_reviews.title: So hot it could peal paint off of metal
customer_reviews.text: Dangerously hot. The high speed blows fuses after 5 minutes of continuous use The low speed is as hot as the high speed. This is a dangerous appliance. I have purchased a different brand and now I am totally satisfied. This product should be reviewed for safety. It easily burns the user., and is a fire hazard with the intense heat and propensity to blow fuses. I’ve kept this one as a back up if my new one breaks down.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA MORENO

customer_reviews.title: Old Trusty
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to hair dryer. I’ve literally been buying this brand and style for years. Each hair dryer has lasted 10+ years. The only reason I replaced my last one was because the loop to hang it snapped. So sad! Anyways, it really is lightweight. It works well. It dries as expected and the cool shot feature is one of the main reasons I keep coming back. So, if you want a basic, lightweight hairdryer with no frills., this one is great!
customer_reviews.author: Go4theguasto

customer_reviews.title: Save your money....
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t write reviews but I’m seriously disappointed this one got so many 5 stars. It will dry your wet nails, that’s about it. It will not dry your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working before 9 weeks. Had previous problem with it shutting itself off, finally reset button quit resetting. Inexpensive but poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: BarrydBucher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Actually got this to try to style my hair a little bit. Since I don't need it on for long periods of time no idea on the other reviews of the motor smoking and burning out, but for short term use I've had no issues. Definitely a travel size. Does get hot air going fairly quick. If you need for short uses at a time, think this is perfect. If you do a lot of styling and takes a longer period of time, I'd read other reviews on people who would need that.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: A good hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: Good hair dryer for the money. The only thing that I don't like about it: The part that plugs into the wall outlet is bulky and the chord is short, so if you have an outlet close to the floor and you stand up to dry your hair, it will come out of the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Young

customer_reviews.title: Good but Limited for Price
customer_reviews.text: Didn't want to spend a lot of new dryer. Decent, not overwhelming power but good heat on high setting, lightweight. Very good value for money. Large - would not call it a travel dryer.
customer_reviews.author: BDG

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great compact dryer...size, power & price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hairdryer. Despite its small size, it works well to quickly dry my hair. It is also easier to handle than the larger and heavier hairdryer I use to have! The price was better than both Target & Walmart. I definitely recommend this product if you are looking for a lighter, more compact dryer that is still powerful enough to get the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Busy mom

customer_reviews.title: Revlon 1875W Compact Travel Hair Dryer is a great value
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a Travel Size Hair Dryer and the Revlon 1875w Compact Travel Dryer was a good price for what I was looking for; I only wish that the handle was able to fold to save room; but it is a good value for a Hair Dryer that is going to be used for when you are traveling!
customer_reviews.author: NJersey

customer_reviews.title: It do in fact work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a heat source for applying talon grips to firearms. They are rubber grips that are applied on with heat. This worked for my propose. I keep my hair buzze, so I have no idea if this works for intended purpose. It dose blow very hot air though my hand got really hot applying and rubbing the grips to the gun.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I used my 20-year-old dryer and noticed the plug was super hot when I unplugged it. It uses the same type of fused plug like this one, but I have since learned the issue is probably caused by my outlet. I experienced the same thing with this new Revlon dryer. It works great but doesn't move as much air as my older blow dryer. Knowing what I know now, I am glad I wasn't quick to throw it out, but now I am afraid to use either of them. My home is older and so it the wiring so I will need to be very careful with anything that uses that much power.
customer_reviews.author: 🤗Ovrjoyd🤗

customer_reviews.title: Garbage! Started smoking right away, fan never turned in
customer_reviews.text: Plugged in and turned on, fan never started and just billowed smoke!! I bought this as a cheap hair dryer to bathe my dog during the winter. I didn’t even work for a second. I guess the other bad reviews were right! Stay away unless you want your house to smell like burnt plastic
customer_reviews.author: The Tweeze

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed (diffusing)
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair dryer. It is smaller than I anticipated but perfect for diffusing as it is not too heavy. Only has 3 settings (high/low and a cold shot). I am not a huge fan if having hold a button for the cold air, but not a big deal to me. This does not seem like the type of tool I would pack for traveling but is do-able. The diffuser linked below is the one I have and it fit perfectly I ordered it separately. This is perfect for home not sure how it would do in a salon as it is quite small. 🙂 Hair Diffuser, Hair Dryer...
customer_reviews.author: xstvrx

customer_reviews.title: Good hairdryer for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice replacement for another Revlon hair dryer that my wife had which was about 10 years old. Used everyday, finally died. If this new hairdryer lasts at least 1/8 of the time the old one did it would be great. The overall size of the hair dryer is smaller than expected but she likes that because it is lighter and more portable but with a lot (if not more) power than the older, more clunky one that died. Solid construction, good sturdy cord, well built buttons. Here is to keeping my fingers cross that it survives the grueling morning process that my wife does everyday.
customer_reviews.author: goodtimes

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for long period on a single use
customer_reviews.text: If you use it for a long period of time on a single use, the plastic will melt or deform. I know that it’s normal for plastic to behave that way due to heat exposure but the manufacturer could use a more strong plastic. It could increase the price but after 3 months of use I asked my girlfriend how the hair dryer was working and she showed me the melted plastic. Because I’m not expert on the subject, I asked my girlfriend if she could get another one what brand would pick? She told me that Remington was the best. So for my next gift probably I get a different brand
customer_reviews.author: JD Tech

customer_reviews.title: Cord was short, but good for $10
customer_reviews.text: This dryer has a much shorter cord than I expected, and with me being a barber that really limits my usage. However, for roughly $10 it dries well enough and has a good amount of power. I'd recommend this more for home usage in the bathroom, and moreso for men than women. (Having longer hair requires more heat and power for an efficient drying time)
customer_reviews.author: jackson

customer_reviews.title: Been Using for Over a Year.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this little hair dryer for over a year, and I am still just so impressed by what a great deal it is. I'm an early childhood educator who does not spend a lot of time prepping my appearance in the morning. However, I have extremely oily fine hair that needs to be washed and dried every day before I go to work. This dryer has been doing the job for over a year an keeps on ticking - love it!
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Case

customer_reviews.title: A Good Value !
customer_reviews.text: My wife's hair dryer is big, heavy, loud with numerous settings , air, heat and attachments . I just needed something to dry my hair and not brake the bank, this is it. After six months of daily use I am more than happy. It's a great size light weight and It's constructed very well ,it has good air flow and two heat settings, When you see other units that cost three times more ,it really makes you wonder how could they sell it so cheep.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Compact Hair Dryer: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Replacing your favorite hair dryer when it goes kaput is never easy. This product had a high rating and I couldn't believe the price so I gave it a shot! OMG! My shoulder length hair never looked so great, even with my expensive (now defunct) hair dryer. And it dried my hair far faster than before. Has a much stronger flow of air than I was used to.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Chauvet

customer_reviews.title: Best Dryer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dryer to store on our boat. All the reviews were great, but the price is so cheap, wasn't sure what the catch would be. I love everything about the dryer, its very lightweight and the drying power is fantastic. I have very thick hair and the dryer does a nice job. Most importantly, it doesn't take hours to dry it. The size makes it easy to store especially when you don't have much storage. I highly recommend this dryer. I am planning on buying duplicates to replace my bulkier, heavier dryers.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Loved while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Love this blow dryer 😍. Light weight and gets really hot. Update: ok so after 4 months it caught fire 🔥 while I was using it yup you heard right while I was using it that being said it’s a cheap product I guess bayou get what you pay for. Really disappointed 😔 though the one I replaced it with I’ve had for years before it went out and it just went out it didn’t burn up in my hand. My daughter was so scared. The photo is after it caught fire.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: This thing blows!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing blows. Just like you think it would. I haven’t blown dry since the 80’s but as an aging bearded hipster I find it necessary to blow dry for maximum volume. This guy does the trick. Wish it had a retractable cord but I wish everything had a retractable cord. There’s also a cool button for making your hair extra cool.
customer_reviews.author: Imnertnert

customer_reviews.title: Pretty low “low” setting
customer_reviews.text: Overall I have liked this dryer. It doesn’t take up much space, has a great “high” setting and puts out a good amount of air to dry my hair quickly. I am giving this four starts because the “low” setting is just too low to be useful. I have curly hair and use a diffuser on the end of the barrel. The diffuser fits and stays on well, but the low setting just doesn’t push enough air through. I end up having to use the high setting which frizzes up my hair a bit too much and also is hard on the motor (it smells hot when I use the diffuser on high).
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: Bad product it’s not working
customer_reviews.text: Very bad quality, after a couple of months just stop working, I bought this one to replace a con air that I had for ten years and this one a couple of months and doesn’t work anymore. Don’t buy this brand, it’s bad.
customer_reviews.author: elsalili

customer_reviews.title: Safety Plug does not work
customer_reviews.text: All dryers have a "safety plug" to protect you in case the electrical current is disturbed, with a "test" and "reset" button. After a few months I realized my safety plug didn't work. Pressing the "test" button was supposed to disable the dryer, but it didn't. I thought it might have broken after enough uses, no big deal, so I bought a new one to be safe. To my surprise, the second one came broken from the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shooting sparks and smoke coming out of the unit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in March, it is now May and this is the 2nd time I am using the dryer. After turning it on, 10 seconds later it started shooting out sparks, I quickly unplugged it and then the unit starting to smoke. I didn't even have it on a minute and this happened. I see others on here have expressed the same concern, I wouldn't purchase this product knowing that this could happen.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Good hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: It’s the second one I bought and to be fair, I dropped the first one and broke it. The first lasted for about 5 years and I decided to buy this one again because of its price. It has two speeds. A slow blow and a fairly fast one. have short hair and I use the hair dryer mainly during winter time and every once in a while so I cannot ensure you that it will last forever if used more constantly. For my needs, it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It blows
customer_reviews.text: Good basic dryer, i use one to run my coal forge (blacksmithing) so i had to replace my fiance's and bout the same one. Both work well and the one hooked up to the forge take some real abuse and keeps going. We also use it to fill our guest airbed, cold setting is still pretty warm. Ill update it i find any other uses for it haha
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Tiny powerhouse! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because I needed something yesterday (my blow dryer died) and this had a fast shipping time. First: it arrived even a day sooner than promised which was AWESOME (much appreciated, thank you) and, AND Second: it is crazy powerful. Third: the price is great too! THANK YOU. Now we just need to see how long it lasts and if it gets hot as other reviews mention.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a good hair blow dryer. The price is affordable, easy to use and lightweight. It doesnt offer many functions besides High speed or Low Speed but it gets the job done. I like how much caution stickers and warning it does have. Using it in the bathroom I could get careless so I do need that reminder. Cord is long and sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Midor1tora

customer_reviews.title: Works great, nice design, economical.
customer_reviews.text: Very economical. Looks great. Works great, takes very little space. The dryer gets nice and hot so it's easy to blow your hair out if you have curly hair like me...I'm a guy with shorter hair. If I had to complain about one thing, cord is a little short, but that's what extention cords are for.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great basic blowdryer
customer_reviews.text: As a woman who hasn't owned a blow drier in a decade, this was a great basic blowdryer. It dries my hair quickly, it's lightweight, it's easy to use, but I'd prefer to have a medium setting. The low is fine, but the high is too high, and I'd like something in the middle. But for the price, it's pretty amazing.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blow dryer a few years ago and it's always worked very well for me. It's not the smallest. It's not the smallest blow dryer out there but I keep it in a drawer under my bathroom sink. I like the cool shot feature.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Hairdryer!
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic hair dryer! I love this thing and appreciate that it doesn't take up a huge amount of space on my dresser. This thing gets hot fast and gets my long hair dry in 10 minutes flat. I highly recommend it, I was very pleasantly surprised given the price.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Very bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in this purchase. Though it is light weight and good for traveling, it burns entirely too hot. So hot, that it melted the sides of the hair dryer. I thought it was defective so I returned it and Revlon sent me another which ended up doing the same thing. I would not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Not Safe to Use
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this hair dryer by revlon! After you plug it in the whole dryer smells like it would catch on fire. I got this on sale so I did not waste a lot of money. I recommend you find a different safer dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Mish

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but too powerful
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this drier is so lightweight and compact. However I don't like the speeds it has. It's either super high which feels like it's going to blow your hair off or super low that feels like it has no power to dry your hair. If it had a medium speed, then I'd give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Karen J. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I actually didn't expect a lot out of this hairdryer because of the money but was pleasantly surprised. It dried my hair (I have a ton of hair) quickly and it was very lightweight. Great for traveling! I don't like to use hotel hair dryers. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shophappy

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working completely after about 6 months of very light use
customer_reviews.text: I barely used this thing, maybe once a week over 6 months, and it sat in a drawer unplugged anytime it wasn't in use, and I recently went to use it again and it just wouldn't turn on, no damage to the device at all, it just quit. I guess that's what you get for 10 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Worked a little
customer_reviews.text: The blow dryer came in it's original packaging with no outer box or padding! It also looked like it was tossed in front of our porch. With all the tossing through transit this was bound to be broken. I gave the benefit of the doubt and still used it but it broke within a few weeks. It also had a plastic smell when we used the cold function.
customer_reviews.author: Mtn

customer_reviews.title: TOO LATE TO RETURN
customer_reviews.text: I love Revlon products and I've had a full sized dryer with them and also gifted one to an older sister. I was looking for something to carry with me for overnight trips and vacation. I am highly disappointed by this product. I believe it was poorly and cheaply made. I'm afraid it'll catch on fire so it's just sitting in my drawer for now
customer_reviews.author: Ariel H.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money. Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Burns out after 6 months. Not the best temperature and doesn’t have a nozzle
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Hatchett

customer_reviews.title: Hey look I’ve got a hairdryer!
customer_reviews.text: Very basic and simple. Easy to use.”, easy to understand. Seems to be durable enough for the price and application it will be put to. Seriously this is a very good value, even if it is a mediocre appliance. It does what it was designed to, and it does it rather well considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: It’s compact (but not too small) and perfect for travel/ everyday use. I have mid-back, thick straight hair. I use it to dry my hair just enough so that water won’t be trickling down my back or coat before I head to work. It does the job in 5 minutes, it’s 10$, and i’m on day 7 of consecutive use and so far so good! It was also delivered on time despite the pandemic so yay.
customer_reviews.author: Leira

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy again
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good blow dryer but I’m a lightweight. I have guy hair ( because I’m a guy) so it’s really short and I don’t use it for long amounts of time. Give an A+ for not blowing up in my face or spewing lava at me
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Great product at this price
customer_reviews.text: The last one lasted years and finally broke. For the price, it's easy to replace it when that happens. It's very powerful and can get plenty hot. I bought one for our guest bathroom and one for the dog. He likes his fee dried when he goes out in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: lablack49

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My old one lasted 10+ years. Was surprised to see it was still available. Can't beat the price either! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ibetrkn

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was to replace a dead hair dryer and it is fairly similar. I would not advise buying it for travel, but who's traveling these days anyway? I am happy with the dryer but have one question: Why would you put a "cool air" button on a dryer?
customer_reviews.author: Coastie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a cold state, so it takes forever for my hair to dry. I don't usually like to blow dry my hair, but I needed something to get that last bit of dampness out of my hair. This is the perfect product for that. It would be good as an everyday blowdryer too. Don't forget to buy heat protection spray too, to keep your hair healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Hojak

customer_reviews.title: Basic blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: Your basic blow dryer which is what I was looking for. The only thing I have a problem with is the handle. There’s not enough room on the handle for your hand and the buttons. I accidentally turn in up or off be a cause of the finger room being small
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Hull Reeves

customer_reviews.title: It broke after about 1 dozen uses.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in Jan. 2020 to travel with. I used it about a dozen times and yesterday it stopped with the high setting and started smelling really wierd like it was going to flame up. I only had a month to return it. Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: MOMO

customer_reviews.title: I bought this because it was inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer works super good! My "nice" one broke after one year and I got this because it shipped over night and it was only $10, now I save myself at least 5 min in the mornings (when time is precious). I have long fairly thick hair and about 5-6min and it's dry!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly powerful and fast drying!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly powerful and fast drying! I don't have hair, so not using it as a hair-dryer; but for use as the heating and fan element in a home-made clothes dryer, this is wonderful. **Note that I am a trained engineer and that what I am using it for is completely safe. If you don't know what you're doing, please refrain from using this product outside of it's specifications.**
customer_reviews.author: Edqp

customer_reviews.title: End cap is NOT removable. Dying after just 2.5 months of drying SHORT hair.
customer_reviews.text: Does not have a removable end cap as advertised. Had to painstakingly use a toothpick to try and remove lint. And after only 2.5 months of drying SHORT hair daily, the inner fan sounds like it is struggling to spin as I'm drying my hair. I recommend spending a little more $ to buy a better quality hair dryer WITH a removable cap for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Died after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Won't turn on, no matter what outlet & combinations of buttons on the plug you press. If you use this dryer for more than 10 minutes off and on at a time it will perish like ours just did. I'd give it zero stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Revlon Hair Dryer, will Blow You Away.
customer_reviews.text: It's got pretty good power if that's what you need, but on the LOW mode setting it's perfect. It's light in weight, but at the same time made heavy duty making it solid vs. accidental drops. The Photo shows it size vs. a Razor and Normal Toothbrush. It does not bend as some smallish blow dryers do, but it still won't take up alot of space if you want to take it traveling with you. Definitely would have to go into your suitcase or small rollerbag carry-on. Happy with my purchase, arrive in a few days thanks to my Amazon Prime Membership.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B. "CBreezy"

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Contraption
customer_reviews.text: Disclosure: I'm a senior male. I always preferred the smaller, compact hair dryer. The one I'd been using for eons finally gave out. I chose this brand and model because it looked like a clone of the dearly departed. Anyway, it does the job--has a low and high mode, lightweight and unobtrusive. Dries my gray Afro in record time. Price is right. What more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and has Coolshot feature
customer_reviews.text: After our 15 year old blow dryer bit the dust we wanted something small and simple to replace it. This is used daily and is holding up great. I like the cool shot feature for drying my kiddos hair. It is compact and super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof3littles

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product at first. But, I have long hair and because of this occasionally a hair dryer will grab a couple pieces. Not a big deal. But, with this hair dryer it did that and hasn’t worked good since. I guess you get what you pay for Update: it started working again, sparked, started smoking and now it’s dead. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Not incredibly powerful, but it does the job, and you can't beat the price and size
customer_reviews.text: You might have to dry your hair for an extra minute or two with this vs some large hairdryer, but it works just fine for me, and I've had no problems. I'm giving this product five stars because it satisfies all my needs, and didn't break my bank.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: Great hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: Nice High wattage hairdryer. I bought several of these to use as a makeshift load bank for a generator. On high all of the hairdryers together create a nice load and current draw that exercises my generator.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Wow for $10, this is a very good hair dryer. I'm not fond of blow drying my hair due to the heat might damage my hair. However, this blow dryer has cold air option. Even though it takes longer to dry using cold comparing to hot, but I love the option!
customer_reviews.author: Picky Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Came in used.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible came in the mail used even though I bought it new. This is so not cool now I have to hope to order a whole brand new hair dryer. What a waste of money. I want the person selling this in court cause it clearly said sold new.
customer_reviews.author: Book Vampire

customer_reviews.title: Purchaser
customer_reviews.text: For a low priced compact hair dryer this is pretty powerful! I have thin hair so honestly I wouldn’t need anything bigger or better.
customer_reviews.author: alice

customer_reviews.title: It’s basic
customer_reviews.text: I’m split on this blow dryer. The hi setting is SUPER high, and the low setting is SUPER low— there is no in between. So you’re either gonna be blasting your hair or you’re gonna take your sweet time. It also does not heat up as I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: SandraG

customer_reviews.title: and it works great at drying them off and keeping the coats soft
customer_reviews.text: Actually I bought the Revlon 1875W Compact Travel Hair Dryer for drying my dogs after their baths. I was having to move furniture to get to the plug to unplug my hairdryer, take it to where I was tending to the dogs, take it back to where it was, and move furniture again. So now they have their own, and it works great at drying them off and keeping the coats soft!!
customer_reviews.author: hill1000

customer_reviews.title: I got it opened
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I am getting an opened and obviously used item. I cannot believe the shape of the package when I got it .only wrapped with tape and very clearly used . This is ridiculous that you pay for a new and get a used one . Not recommended
customer_reviews.author: Ali Alsarah

product_meta.title: Revlon 1875W Compact And Lightweight Hair Dryer, Black
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

Revlon Hair Tools is dedicated to helping women achieve beautiful hair they'll love! Whether women desire gorgeous blowouts, big enviable waves, striking straight locks, or the perfect fashion accessory to complete the look, Revlon has the styling tools you desire. 

About the Product: Small and compact, this blow dryer is great for travel. Quickly dry and style your hair with 2 heat and speed settings to suit your personal needs and use the cool shot setting to set the style. With removable end cap for easy cleaning and maintenance. Features a hanging ring for easy storage, protective anti-slip bumpers, and a lightweight and compact design. Black hair dryer.
feature_bullets: Compact and Lightweight Design, Perfect for Travel
2 heat/speed settings for drying and styling flexibility and control
Cool Shot Button help to set the look for a gorgeous, long lasting results

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
